description:
tldr; Come and join us for some festive (sponsored) drinks at our favourite watering hole... Small Bar!

--

Seasons greetings

In 2016 has been an amazing year for Bristol JS.

- We've grown by 444 members to 1167.
- We've had 21 fantastic talks over 11 talk nights.
- We've gained some new friends Novate IT, Pusher & Potato Bristol who have supported us through this growth.

The group's purpose is to educate and provide the value of community to each of its members. The social aspect is massively important to continuing this (and I can personally say I've made some of my closest friends through the group).

This month we're breaking our normal procedure and having a social night in place of a talk night and we'd be delighted if you could join us.

Tonight we're meeting at Small Bar from 18:30. They do some fantastic burgers if you want to join us for some food.
Please RSVP so I can get an idea of numbers.

Lastly, if you can't make it have a fantastic Christmas and we look forward to seeing you in 2017.

Adam Butler
@labfoo
title: XMAS Social
